title: The Unanswered Question - Leonard Bernstein at Harvard 6 DVDRips
description:
"The Unanswered Question" - Leonard Bernstein at Harvard - 6 DVDRips (Clark Santee) [1973, Lecture, DVDRip]


Year : 1973 Genre : Lecture Duration : 105 '+ 96' + 143 '+ 143' + 133 ' Director : Clark Santee Cast : Leonard Bernstein The Harvard Univercity audience Boston Symphony Orchestra 


Description : In this hand, presented a lecture on the music of Leonard Bernstein, read at Harvard University in 1973. Bernstein - very charismatic personality. His lecture capture attention from the very first minutes of viewing. Each film focuses on a different topic: 

[1] First Film: Musical Phonology 
[2] Second Film: Musical Syntax 
[3] The third film: Musical Semantics 
[4] The fourth film: The Delights & Dangers Ambiguity of 
[5] Fifth Film: The XXth Century Crisis 
[6] The film Sixth: The Poetry Of Earth 

During the lectures given musical examples: either Bernstein plays the piano in the studio nahodyaschemya or shows an excerpt of some of his concert with the Boston Symphony Orchestra. Portions of lectures may nonprofessionals will listen hard, as Bernstein says music musicians "in their language." However, if desired, one can understand that too. 


Extras. Info : Movies entirely in English, without translation and subtitles The original uploader is DanseDePuck from MM
